Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.27-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.27-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 20.10.27-1, affected by CVE-2023-48795
